title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models as LangChain LLM/Chat/Embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; Kotlin & Android friendly, supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; slash commands & thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfiles for StableLM, CodeLlama, Vicuna, Zephyr, etc.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app exposing Ollama chat/generate endpoints as Slack slash commands.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django REST API wrapper around Ollama with Swagger UI, token auth, and chat history.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency injection.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes, templates & summarization.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to provision Ollama models and chat sessions as code.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama with async/await, JSON streaming, and nimble package.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed generate/chat/embed APIs via reqwest & tokio.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with std.http and async IO; still experimental.
